## withErrorBoundary() function

### withErrorBoundary() function

HOC for wrapping a component in an error boundary.

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function withErrorBoundary<P = {}>(Component: ComponentType<P>, errorBoundaryProps?: Omit<ErrorBoundaryAlertProps, 'children'>): ComponentType<P>;
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { withErrorBoundary } from '@grafana/ui';
```
<b>Parameters</b>

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Component | <code>ComponentType&lt;P&gt;</code> | the react component to wrap in error boundary |
|  errorBoundaryProps | <code>Omit&lt;ErrorBoundaryAlertProps, 'children'&gt;</code> | error boundary options |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ComponentType<P>`
